scripts.ios:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync ios
scripts.android:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.sync:all: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:build: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.android:build:bundle: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
